name: Little Jimmy 2: Reloaded
description:
The not-long anticipated sequel to Little Jimmy, featuring Little Jimmy himself, Little Bobby, and Charlie the Pocket Troll!  Progress through the portals however you want, avoid obstacles, and choose between two unique boss battles with unique upgrades.  Fly with Little Jimmy today!

Sound design by Myles Kimball White, Little Jimmy ragtime theme taken from the Public Domain.
